meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3923.

td.p: Ivan Kleinfeld, an 11-year-old from Arlington, Virginia
Sara Jansson, a 10-year-old from Monmouth Junction, New Jersey
Brian Cunningham, a 12-year-old from Los Angeles, California

tr.td: HARRY POTTER
AROUND THE HOUSE
AMERICAN HISTORY
DAYTIME TV
RIGHT ON THE MONEY

toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Brian: Um, the handlebar...)
(Alex: No, I need more...)
(Brian: [*]!)
(Alex: That\'s it! But you didn\'t phrase it in the form of a question. However, it\'s okay--in the first round, we let you get away with it. Less than a minute to go.)

banister

Brian
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
